entities.name: PROJECT_PLAN.md
observations: Central source of truth for all tickets

entities.name: Ticket Status Flow
observations: BLOCKED state can occur from any active state
Strict state machine - no shortcuts allowed

entities.name: Anti-Clutter Directives
observations: Never create without checking for duplicates
Single source of truth for everything

entities.name: Core Values
observations: Quality, Efficiency, Security, Documentation OVER Speed
Every line of code must be secure and maintainable
Documentation is part of the deliverable
Take time to do it RIGHT the first time
The better you plan, the better the outcome

tool_response.text:
[
  {
    "name": "PROJECT_PLAN.md",
    "entityType": "Document",
    "observations": [
      "Central source of truth for all tickets",
      "Located in Project_Management folder",
      "Tracks all development work",
      "Contains epics and tickets",
      "Uses story points (1,2,3,5,8,13)",
      "Mandatory before starting any work"
    ]
  },
  {
    "name": "Ticket Status Flow",
    "entityType": "Workflow",
    "observations": [
      "BACKLOG → TODO → IN_PROGRESS",
      "IN_PROGRESS → CODE_REVIEW → QA_TESTING",
      "QA_TESTING → DOCUMENTATION → READY_FOR_RELEASE → DONE",
      "BLOCKED state can occur from any active state",
      "Failures return to IN_PROGRESS",
      "Strict state machine - no shortcuts allowed"
    ]
  },
  {
    "name": "Anti-Clutter Directives",
    "entityType": "Principle",
    "observations": [
      "Search first, create second",
      "Never create without checking for duplicates",
      "Single source of truth for everything",
      "DRY enforcement mandatory",
      "Extract common patterns",
      "Consolidation review required post-implementation",
      "Weekly clutter detection scan required"
    ]
  },
  {
    "name": "Core Values",
    "entityType": "Principle",
    "observations": [
      "Quality, Efficiency, Security, Documentation OVER Speed",
      "Enterprise-grade software worthy of production",
      "Every line of code must be secure and maintainable",
      "Documentation is part of the deliverable",
      "Take time to do it RIGHT the first time",
      "The better you plan, the better the outcome"
    ]
  },
  {
    "name": "Agent Recipes",
    "entityType": "System",
    "observations": [
      "Located in /recipes/ folder",
      "Proven agent combinations",
      "Reusable workflow patterns",
      "Performance-optimized sequences",
      "Context templates included",
      "Continuously refined based on metrics"
    ]
  }
]
